actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: To establish a commission to study employment and economic insecurity in the United States workforce.
short_title: National Commission on Employment and Economic Security Act

summary.text: National Commission on Employment and Economic Security Act - Establishes the National Commission on Employment and Economic Security to: (1) examine the effects of economic and psychological insecurity caused by employment displacement and the decreasing number of well-paid jobs on U.S. workers and their families; and (2) recommend to the President and Congress potential solutions, including legislative and administrative action, to alleviate such problems.

titles.title: National Commission on Employment and Economic Security Act
To establish a commission to study employment and economic insecurity in the United States workforce.
